Package org.jsfml.graphics

Class Text

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.Text
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, TextStyle, Transformable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Text
public class Text extends SFMLNativeObject implements Drawable, TextStyle
Represents a graphical text that can be transformed and drawn to a render target.

This class implements the TextStyle interface for quick access to the constants provided by it.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface org.jsfml.graphics.TextStyle

    • setStyle

      public void setStyle(int style)
      Sets the font drawing style.
      Parameters:
      style - The font drawing style. This should be an combination (OR) of the style flags TextStyle.BOLD, TextStyle.ITALIC and TextStyle.UNDERLINED, or TextStyle.REGULAR for the regular style.
